books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: A carload of people involved in a conspiracy pick up a disheveled hitchhiker, Child’s vigilante hero Jack Reacher.
books.name: A WANTED MAN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas investigates a mass delusion caused by a cocktail of chemicals and illegal drugs at a bar her husband owns; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously
books.name: DELUSION IN DEATH

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Richard Castle
books.description: The N.Y.P.D. homicide detective Nikki Heat investigates the case of a woman whose body is found in a freezer.
books.name: FROZEN HEAT

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A fable about the inventor of the world’s first clock, who returns to our world after centuries of banishment; from the author of “Tuesdays With Morrie.”
books.name: THE TIME KEEPER

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: A young biologist warns world leaders about the reasons for escalating animal attacks on cities.
books.name: ZOO

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Michael Chabon
books.description: Fathers and sons in Berkeley and Oakland, Calif.
books.name: TELEGRAPH AVENUE

books.author: by Jill Shalvis
books.description: Maddie leaves Los Angeles to take over a ramshackle inn left to her by her mother. A Lucky Harbor novel.
books.name: SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE

books.author: by Tina Reber
books.description: A pub owner finds herself in a very public romance with a Hollywood actor; Book 2 in the Love Series.
books.name: LOVE UNREHEARSED

books.author: by Mark Helprin
books.description: Heroic lives in Manhattan between the late 19th century and the year 2000. Originally published in 1983.
books.name: WINTER'S TALE

books.author: by Junot Díaz
books.description: Stories of love, loss and family history from a Pulitzer Prize-winning novelist.
books.name: THIS IS HOW YOU LOSE HER
